posts.message: Any suggestions for workarounds to bypass these limits in order to pay for hosting at least ?!

Just like jsfiddle and codepen but with boilerplates for React and Angular apps
Becomes handy if you need to focus on learning these frameworks without having to deal with all of the configurations and setup
[It also allows you to download the project]

posts.message:
i just want to say this

the situation in Egypt became very boring
why we are "small" people?
most companies do BS work, you rarely find a company that do serious computer science related stuff, or just do what they do right

what should new programmers do?, work for this companies and then just move to similar one that just bigger?

i have been in companies that have so called "seniors" that know nothing about computer science

i have a lot to say on this, but i know that no benefits from writing it, i would just be happy if i don't feel this alone

I have a simple question (maybe with some bad intentions ?)
It's about Yarn (the new Facebook package manager)
Why didn't Facebook simply contributed to NPM ? Isn't it the whole idea of OSS ?
Which lead to another question: When should OSS contributors/devs decide to contribute to an existing projects or to start their own ?

posts.description: Don’t lose sight of reality while being charmed by our culture’s Silicon Valley romance.
